# [Interview #1147: Bands of Mourning Release Party, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1147#3)

#### Mailliw73

Can an Epic's weakness change?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Brandon said so far they have not.
